title: Language Proficiency Improvement Program Using Digital Game-Based Competitive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience using digital games
context.additional_context: Language learning design combining competition and self-improvement in a smartphone-based environment; requires application of personalized competitive mechanisms by learner proficiency levels

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and apply social competition and self-competition strategies in digital game environments.
Learners can maintain learning motivation by selecting competition types appropriate to their proficiency level during language task performance.
Learners can quantitatively analyze the extent of language proficiency improvement through a game-based assessment system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
